experiences.title: Middle School Math Teacher
desc: Develope and improve lesson plans to increase efficiency in student's educational performance.
Collaborate with teachers, counselors and administrators to share experiences and skills to form a dynamic learning environment.
Foster clear communication to various groups of people with differing levels of understanding and involvement.
Innovate and experiment with new processes, tools or technologies to improve classroom environment.

experiences.title: Bootcamp Student
desc: Build websites that use Bootstrap, CSS and JavaScript to develope a responsive design to fit all screen sizes.
Create state-aware applications using redux toolkit while implementing React, JavaScript ES6 and React Hooks.
Transform website into true mobile application using React Native and Expo SDK.
Implement back-end data storage, authentication and cybersecurity with the use of NodeJS, Express and MongoDB.

experiences.title: Web Developer
desc: Create user-friendly web pages that is optimized for maximum performance.
Maintain and improve website while implementing mobile-based features.
Collaborate with the customer to improve website visuals and functionality.
Troubleshooting issues that may arise on the front-end or back-end.

projects.title: Nail Salon
projects.desc: A minimalist website for a minority owned small business. Customers are able to book appointments, look at services offered, learn about the store's history, and view the salon's best work.

projects.title: NuCamp
projects.desc: A website built during my bootcamp course with NuCamp. It started as responsive website with Bootstrap then became dynamic with React.
